rows.label: tlk43100341_02_msg0001
rows.name: Well, I heard this from my dad.

rows.label: tlk43100341_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Last year, he was getting a Core Crystal
shipment from Fons Maim port, but it
got stolen by this nasty pair of Blades.

rows.label: tlk43100341_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Even the tough mercs they'd hired for
protection got bashed up. My dad got
injured too.

rows.label: tlk43100341_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I bet they'd come at you too, if they
thought you had some Core Crystals.
Better run if they do!
